name: Zmap
tagline: a jquery plugin create google map v3 quickly
body:
= Usage First you need include jquery(>1.3) lib and google map(v3) scripts. Then include jquery.zmap lib script. == Basic Usage: HTML partial.
Info Window Content.
script partial $(document).ready(function(){ $("#map").zmap(); }); Have Fun! == Examples see examples dir for more details. {example demo}[http://zires.github.com/zmap/example] == Options You can pass any google map support option. * marker --- default true. You can pass custom google marker or a array contain lots of markers. * infowindow --- default true. Only effect when marker set true. You can pass custom google infowindow object. * before --- function(options){}. Callback before map initialize. * after --- function(map){}. Callback after map created. * lat --- special lat value. * lng --- special lng value. * address --- default is your map div container text. special address. * infoContent --- default is your map div container text. special info window content.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
